metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35572 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Adminer through 4.7.8 allows XSS via the history parameter to the default URI.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-35572` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

adminer - 4.7.9-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: adminer package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.7.9-2').
